Comment: Idiot Trump may be single-mindedly pursuing his idea for a "Nobel Peace Prize" but he's more likely to be convicted of 'crimes against humanity.'  Of course, exterminating the native indigent peoples of invaded and colonized territories is a grand historical tradition for the world's most 'exceptional' countries.  Look out, Greenland. You're in his sites. NATO be damned.
Author: YallerDawg
